response.summary:
Electronic engineer with experience as  Test engineer in automotive sector, production manager and performing maintenance in optical laboratory, with knowledge in Schneider machines in the production stage, lens machining ophthalmic digital carving (CNC and PLC machines), UltraOptics and Optotech in application of anti-scratch and anti-reflective treatments, Passionate for modeling and simulation systems, experienced in creating virtual environments, including VR and AR experiences. Proficient in using ASAM OpenSCENARIO and generating virtual routes in ASAM OpenDRIVE for simulation in Unreal Engine's CARLA software.

Knowledge of programming languages, C ++, Python, Ladder, VHDL, Arduino and Mathlab, in simulation software Zelio soft, fluidSim, solidworks, RoadRunner, Carmaker, Carla Unreal and Unity, ASAM OpenSCENARIO, OpenDrive, SketchUp,  Optotech's LMS (RxOffice), handling SQL and MYSQL databases and mobile applications. With big skills in speed learning, recursion, practical solution to unexpected events or situations. 

Own works: 

Constant recording and alarm system in production machines where temperature is used as a control variable. Adaptation of machinery and production processes to achieve quality goals and standards. Anti-glare recipes, silver, red, orange, mirror colors pink, green and greater hardness in them. Report and alarm of damages, delays and laboratory statuses, uniting LMS databases with telegram mobile applications.

Degree thesis with a 5.0 / 5.0 rating: Immersion system to the virtual reality (https://youtu.be/O9IFhYbF_Sg)

Prototype made in Unity is a visit to the Plaza de Bolívar in Bogotá 
(https://danoguerab.itch.io/plazadebolivar2?pasword=1073)

Web-VR project for mobile devices, multi-player (on construction) that allows a tour of La Candelaria in Bogotá, Colombia (https://playcanv.as/p/PKiLY2au/).

Web invitation project for mobile devices, actually increased to the science museum of the National University of Colombia.
response.skills: OSC (Open scenario), Virtual validation system, Virtual testing, IPG CarMaker, Vector CANalyzer, Python (Programming Language), Carla, Virtual Reality (VR), Microsoft Office, Investigación, Unity, SolidWorks, Arduino, Matlab, LMS, AR coating, Blender, OrCAD, playcanvas, LogixPro

profile_positions.description: Prodution  and maintenance manager of optical lab with staff human being in charge, with an interest inn achievement, improvement and dedication, adds to this the maintenance of the machines involved in process complete lens in freeform technology. Desing new devices or software tech for obtain instant information about the process status.
profile_positions.title: Production and Maintenance manager

profile_positions.description: Project manager of virtual reality  (VR and AR).
profile_positions.title: Electronic engineer

profile_positions.description: Practicante SENA, labores de mantenimiento industrial a nivel mecánico, neumático y electrónico.
profile_positions.title: Instrumentista Industrial

education.degree_name: tecnólogo en instrumentación y control de procesos industriales

company.name: Valeo
company.description:
As a technology company and partner to all automakers and new mobility players, Valeo innovates to make mobility cleaner, safer and smarter. Valeo is a technological and industrial leader in electrification, driving assistance systems, reinvention of the interior experience and lighting everywhere. These four areas, vital to the transformation of mobility, are the Group's growth drivers. Valeo in figures: 20 billion euros in sales in 2022; 109,900 employees at December 31, 2022; 29 countries, 183 plants, 21 research centers, 44 development centers, 18 distribution platforms. Valeo is listed on the Paris Stock Exchange.
--
Valeo, entreprise technologique, partenaire de tous les constructeurs automobiles et des nouveaux acteurs de la mobilité, œuvre pour une mobilité plus propre, plus sûre et plus intelligente, grâce à ses innovations. Valeo dispose d’un leadership technologique et industriel dans l’électrification, les aides à la conduite, la réinvention de la vie à bord et l'éclairage à l’intérieur et à l’extérieur du véhicule. Ces quatre domaines, essentiels à la transformation de la mobilité, sont les vecteurs de croissance du Groupe. Valeo en chiffres : 20 milliards d’euros de CA en 2022 ; 109 900 collaborateurs au 31 décembre 2022 ; 29 pays, 183 sites de production, 21 centres de recherche, 44 centres de développement, 18 plateformes de distribution. Valeo est coté à la Bourse de Paris.
